name: Hunter-McMain, Inc.
tagline: An Advertising and Graphic Design Firm.
description:
Hunter-McMain, an advertising and graphic design firm has served the Houston area since 1989. With more than 20 years of diverse practical experience, Hunter-McMain specializes in creative design services and implementing marketing programs for clients in a wide variety of fields from concept to completion.

High quality, attention to detail, and effective and convincing advertising are the key components of our success.  Through careful consideration of every facet of each client’s needs, Hunter-McMain takes pride in capturing a unique and personal design style. This is especially important for companies just getting started or for those who are already established but want to expand.
Additionally, Hunter-McMain created two separate divisions, Cheep Cheep Postcards™ and Cheep Cheep Websites™. These divisions were “Created expressly for those with high standards and low budgets.”™
